blocks.name: df-cnvrefs
blocks.content: Define the class of all converse reflexive sets, see the comment of ~ df-ssr . It is used only by ~ df-cnvrefrels . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: df-cnvrefrels
blocks.content: Define the class of converse reflexive relations. This is practically ~ dfcnvrefrels2 (which uses the traditional subclass relation ` C_ ` ) : we use converse subset relation ( ~ brcnvssr ) here to ensure the comparability to the definitions of the classes of all reflexive ( ~ df-ref ), symmetric ( ~ df-syms ) and transitive ( ~ df-trs ) sets. We use this concept to define functions ( ~ df-funsALTV , ~ df-funALTV ) and disjoints ( ~ df-disjs , ~ df-disjALTV ). For sets, being an element of the class of converse reflexive relations is equivalent to satisfying the converse reflexive relation predicate, see ~ elcnvrefrelsrel . Alternate definitions are ~ dfcnvrefrels2 and ~ dfcnvrefrels3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 7-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: df-cnvrefrel
blocks.content: Define the converse reflexive relation predicate (read: ` R ` is a converse reflexive relation), see also the comment of ~ dfcnvrefrel3 . Alternate definitions are ~ dfcnvrefrel2 and ~ dfcnvrefrel3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 16-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: dfcnvrefrels2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of converse reflexive relations. See the comment of ~ dfrefrels2 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 21-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfcnvrefrels2(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(ccnvrefrels, crab(s0, crels, wss(cv(s0), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))))
} = {
  abeqinbi(s0, ccnvrefrels, crels, ccnvrefs, wss(cv(s0), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))))
  df-cnvrefrels()
  df-cnvrefs(s0)
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))))
  mp2b(wb(wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))), wcel(cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), universe), wcel(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), universe))
  xpex(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wcel(cdm(cv(s0)), universe))
  dmexg(cv(s0), universe)
  elv(s0, wcel(crn(cv(s0)), universe))
  rnexg(cv(s0), universe)
  inex2ALTV(cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), universe, cid)
  brcnvssr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), universe, cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))
  sseq1d(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), crels))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), crels), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))
  elrels6(cv(s0), universe)
  diff.crels.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfcnvrefrels2(setvar s0) {
  ‚ä¢ CnvRefRels = { s0 ‚àà Rels | s0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))}
} = {
  abeqinbi(s0, ccnvrefrels, crels, ccnvrefs, s0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  df-cnvrefrels()
  df-cnvrefs(s0)
  syl5bb(s0 ‚àà Rels, (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), s0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), (s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  mp2b(((= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚Üî(s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))), (dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))‚àà ùïå, (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚àà ùïå)
  xpex(dom(s0), ran(s0))
  elv(s0, dom(s0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(s0, universe)
  elv(s0, ran(s0)‚àà ùïå)
  rnexg(s0, universe)
  inex2ALTV((dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)), universe, cid)
  brcnvssr((= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), universe, (s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  sseq1d((s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), s0, s0 ‚àà Rels)
  biimpi(s0 ‚àà Rels, (s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))= s0)
  elv(s0, (s0 ‚àà Rels ‚Üî(s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))= s0))
  elrels6(s0, universe)
  diff.crels.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dfcnvrefrels3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the class of converse reflexive relations. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfcnvrefrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wceq(ccnvrefrels, crab(s0, crels, wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  rabbieq(s0, ccnvrefrels, crels, wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))))
  abeqin(s0, ccnvrefrels, crels, ccnvrefs, wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))))
  df-cnvrefrels()
  df-cnvrefs(s0)
  bitri(wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))))
  mp2b(wb(wbr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), ccnv(cssr), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), wss(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))), wcel(cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), universe), wcel(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), universe))
  xpex(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wcel(cdm(cv(s0)), universe))
  dmexg(cv(s0), universe)
  elv(s0, wcel(crn(cv(s0)), universe))
  rnexg(cv(s0), universe)
  inex2ALTV(cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), universe, cid)
  brcnvssr(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), universe, cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))
  inxpssidinxp(s1, s2, cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))
  diff.crels.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.crn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.crn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfcnvrefrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ‚ä¢ CnvRefRels = { s0 ‚àà Rels | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà dom(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),(s1[s0]s2 ‚Üí s1 = s2)))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  rabbieq(s0, ccnvrefrels, crels, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà dom(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),(s1[s0]s2 ‚Üí s1 = s2))), (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  abeqin(s0, ccnvrefrels, crels, ccnvrefs, (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  df-cnvrefrels()
  df-cnvrefs(s0)
  bitri((= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà dom(s0), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà ran(s0),(s1[s0]s2 ‚Üí s1 = s2))), (s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  mp2b(((= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))[`' _S](s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚Üî(s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))), (dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))‚àà ùïå, (= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)))‚àà ùïå)
  xpex(dom(s0), ran(s0))
  elv(s0, dom(s0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(s0, universe)
  elv(s0, ran(s0)‚àà ùïå)
  rnexg(s0, universe)
  inex2ALTV((dom(s0)√ó ran(s0)), universe, cid)
  brcnvssr((= ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))), universe, (s0 ‚ãÇ(dom(s0)√ó ran(s0))))
  inxpssidinxp(s1, s2, s0, dom(s0), ran(s0))
  diff.crels.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, s0)
  diff.crn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: dfcnvrefrel2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the converse reflexive relation predicate. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 24-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dfcnvrefrel3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the converse reflexive relation predicate. A relation is converse reflexive iff: for all elements on its domain and range, if for an element of its domain and for an element of its range there is the relation between them, then the two elements are the same, cf. the comment of ~ dfrefrel3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfcnvrefrel3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcnvrefrel(c0), wa(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrel(c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcnvrefrel(c0), wa(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrel(c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wrel(c0)))
  df-cnvrefrel(c0)
  anbi1i(wss(cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wrel(c0), wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  inxpssidinxp(s0, s1, c0, cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfcnvrefrel3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (CnvRefRel(c0)‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1)))‚àß Rel(c0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(CnvRefRel(c0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1)))‚àß Rel(c0)), ((c0 ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0)))‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0)))‚àß Rel(c0)))
  df-cnvrefrel(c0)
  anbi1i((c0 ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0)))‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0))), Rel(c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1))))
  inxpssidinxp(s0, s1, c0, dom(c0), ran(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: elcnvrefrels2
blocks.content: Element of the class of converse reflexive relations. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm elcnvrefrels2(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccnvrefrels), wa(wss(c0, cin(cid, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wcel(c0, crels)))
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ccnvrefrels, crels, wss(c0, cin(cid, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wss(cv(hs0), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0))))))
  dfcnvrefrels2(hs0)
  sseq12d(cv(hs0), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0)))), c0, cin(cid, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq2d(cid, cxp(cdm(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0))), cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  xpeq12d(cdm(cv(hs0)), crn(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, cin(cid, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elcnvrefrels2(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CnvRefRels ‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels))
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ccnvrefrels, crels, c0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0))), hs0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(hs0)√ó ran(hs0))))
  dfcnvrefrels2(hs0)
  sseq12d(hs0, (= ‚ãÇ(dom(hs0)√ó ran(hs0))), c0, (= ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0))), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  ineq2d(cid, (dom(hs0)√ó ran(hs0)), (dom(c0)√ó ran(c0)), hs0 = c0)
  xpeq12d(dom(hs0), ran(hs0), dom(c0), ran(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  rneq(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚äÜ(= ‚ãÇ(dom(c0)√ó ran(c0))))
}

blocks.name: elcnvrefrels3
blocks.content: Element of the class of converse reflexive relations. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 30-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elcnvrefrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccnvrefrels), wa(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, crels)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ccnvrefrels, crels, wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wral(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  dfcnvrefrels3(hs0, s0, s1)
  raleqbidv(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  raleqbidv(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  rneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  breq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cdm(c0), wral(s1, crn(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elcnvrefrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CnvRefRels ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Rels))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  rabeqel(hs0, c0, ccnvrefrels, crels, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(hs0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0),(s0[hs0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1))))
  dfcnvrefrels3(hs0, s0, s1)
  raleqbidv(s0, dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(hs0),(s0[hs0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1)))
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  raleqbidv(s1, ran(hs0), ran(c0), hs0 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1), (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1))
  rneq(hs0, c0)
  imbi1d(hs0 = c0, s0[hs0]s1, s0 = s1, s0[c0]s1)
  breq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crels)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ran(c0),(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s0 = s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: elcnvrefrelsrel
blocks.content: For sets, being an element of the class of converse reflexive relations ( ~ df-cnvrefrels ) is equivalent to satisfying the converse reflexive relation predicate. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: cnvrefrelcoss2
blocks.content: Necessary and sufficient condition for a coset relation to be a converse reflexive relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 27-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: cosselcnvrefrels2
blocks.content: Necessary and sufficient condition for a coset relation to be an element of the converse reflexive relation class. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: cosselcnvrefrels3
blocks.content: Necessary and sufficient condition for a coset relation to be an element of the converse reflexive relation class. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 30-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cosselcnvrefrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(ccoss(c0), ccnvrefrels), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels)), wa(wss(ccoss(c0), cid), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels)))
  cosselcnvrefrels2(c0)
  anbi1i(wss(ccoss(c0), cid), wcel(ccoss(c0), crels), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  cossssid3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cosselcnvrefrels3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (, ~(c0)‚àà CnvRefRels ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))‚àß, ~(c0)‚àà Rels))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(, ~(c0)‚àà CnvRefRels, (‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2))))‚àß, ~(c0)‚àà Rels), (, ~(c0)‚äÜ = ‚àß, ~(c0)‚àà Rels))
  cosselcnvrefrels2(c0)
  anbi1i(, ~(c0)‚äÜ =, , ~(c0)‚àà Rels, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s0[c0]s2)‚Üí s1 = s2)))))
  cossssid3(s0, s1, s2, c0)
}
